programme.title: Blessing of Formosa(T) Ep167
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1838
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1049
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Just 1 Day
programme.desc: Mosaic, an urban sketcher, is suffering from ALS and wants to create some fond memories as his condition worsens. When Mosaic reunites with his old classmate Angelfish, whom he has a crush on since primary school, he asks her to fulfill his one last wish by becoming his girlfriend for just one day. Will Angelfish say yes?

programme.title: The Rookies
programme.desc: An extreme sports lover accidentally gets involved in an illegal trading activity by international crime syndicates. Led by international special agent Bruce, he forms an amateur unit with a police officer, an inventor and a doctor to fight the crime syndicates together, leading to a series of thrilling and hilarious adventures.

programme.title: Far Far Away
programme.desc: A 28-year-old IT geek has only been in love once. Surprisingly, he ends up getting romantically involved with five different women this year and the one thing they have in common is that they all live in far flung areas of Hong Kong. After taking five intensive relationship courses within these 365 days, will he find the-one?

programme.title: Coffin Homes
programme.desc: Three bizarre tales intertwine in this horror satire set against the housing crisis of Hong Kong, where soaring property prices have driven dwellers to take every insane effort necessary to secure a cramped space, even if it means sharing the same roof with the dead!

programme.title: Justice Sung Sai Kit
programme.desc: An actor who portrayed the famous Justice Sung Sai Kit is sent back in time to the Qing dynasty after he meets a mysterious woman. There, he reprises his role as a lawyer and sets out to protect the poor from the wealthy. However, as time travelling is outlawed, the time-travel police are on the hunt to stop the duo from changing history.

programme.title: The Infernal Walker
programme.desc: Ting is an undercover police who infiltrates a triad and Tuen is a triad mole being planted into the police force. While Tang is tired of being an undercover cop, Tuen wishes to quit the triad and become a real police. When the triad boss sets a trap to uncover the moles' identity, the two must fight for themselves.

programme.title: The Sunny Side of the Street
programme.desc: Hassan is a Pakistani refugee boy whose father has died in a car accident. A local taxi driver, Yat, then helps him flee Hong Kong. In the process, the two gradually develop a father-son relationship, until Hassan discovers the shocking truth about his fathers death

programme.title: A Writer's Odyssey
programme.desc: Based on a novel of the same name, this is the story about a father who must kill a novelist in order to find his missing daughter. Through a strange twist of fate, the fantasy world of the novel begins to impact life in the real world.

programme.title: Till We Meet Again
programme.desc: Ng Ka Wai is hoping that he will see his loving mother Mui again one day. Mui has apparently been avoiding her son for over a decade while Wai is suffering from depression and panic disorder. When his lost memory suddenly returns, he recalls what he has done to his mother - an unforgivable sin leading to the 10-year separation.

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: Fok Kit is the hottest underground boxer with unbeatable records. To save their boxing studio from being sold, he must win the fight against Shaolin who is known as "Killing Machine". Fok Kit is defeated and badly hurt in the fight, which is a set-up by Lok, who wants to take revenge on Fok Kits master, Debo.

programme.title: Life Must Go On
programme.desc: When the midnight gymnasium programme for wayward teenage girls is at funding risk, social worker Yanki puts together a dodgeball team to compete in a match and save it. With an ex-star athlete John as the coach, the girls realize they must face their problems and overcome their challenges instead of dodging them. Can they finally win the match?

programme.title: Distinction
programme.desc: A music teacher in a special needs school, an underachiever from an elite school, and a rebellious teenager with a handicapped brother take part in a campus musical for various reasons. Little did they know that this turns out to be a journey of self-discovery.

programme.title: Wolf Pack
programme.desc: The Wolf Pack squad led by Lao Diao, is a foreign-based team that specializes in overseas security jobs. In one of the missions, the squad discovers that a terrorist force is planning to destroy the countrys energy source. Lao Diao is now entrusted with the task of leading his squad to fight back. Can the Wolf Pack save the day?

programme.title: Invisible Target
programme.desc: Three young police officers driven by different motives decide to join forces to defeat Tien and his lethal, mercenary gang. As they team up to prevent another massive robbery, they discover that it is instigated by another unknown man. With courage, wits and dexterity, the trio are determined to not let Tien and the instigator escape.

programme.title: First Love the Litter on the Breeze
programme.desc: This movie is the directorial debut of actor Eric Kot for Wong Kar Wai. Eric features the topic of first love in his first movie: a sleepwalker guided through the night by a lonely admirer is bizarre yet romantic, while a married grocer facing the vengeful first love that he once rejected is heartbreaking.

programme.title: The White Storm 2: Drug Lords
programme.desc: In this epic action-thriller starring Andy Lau and Louis Koo, the two award-winning best actors star on opposing sides of a drug war. As a bounty of $100 million Hong Kong dollars is made to hunt down the biggest drug dealer in the city, Hong Kong becomes the battleground for the fight between good and evil.

programme.title: Mr & Mrs Gambler
programme.desc: Manfred and Flora are gambling addicts who have come across each other a few times at the casino, but do not leave impression on each other until they both suffer heavy losses and are held hostage by the loan sharks in Macau. They find themselves falling in love, and decide to get married when they come back to Hong Kong.

programme.title: I Still Remember
programme.desc: Chi is a property agent who leads an aimless and unfulfilling life until he reunites with his P.E. teacher, Wong, from primary school. Despite his illness, Wong insists on keeping his promise of completing a 10K marathon to his late wife. Inspired by Wong, Chi brings himself to his feet and finds the courage to cheer himself on!

programme.title: My Kickass Wife
programme.desc: Jade is a beautiful royal guard who is set up for marriage by the Queen in order to avoid the King setting eyes on her. Jade falls for Sean and helps him win the contest for her. After the wedding, Sean discovers her bad temper and visits a brothel in his despair. He meets and is attracted to a girl there, not knowing she has a secret agenda...

programme.title: Undercover Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, Fat is a gangster who suffers from amnesia. Believing that he is actually an undercover policeman, Fat attempts to arrest gang leader Big Bro, but instead becomes the gangsters best ally. To complicate matters further, a gangster named Wind, who looks exactly like Fat, starts a turf war with Big Bro.

programme.title: The New Big Boss
programme.desc: A young man seeks out the Wolf, a legendary undefeated warrior. When he sees that the Wolf is now an old man, he prompts him to retell his past glories.

programme.title: The Way We Keep Dancing
programme.desc: This sequel of The Way We Dance features the plight of Hong Kongs grassroots performing artists as they fight against the governments plan to gentrify an industrial district where they settled in.

programme.title: Golden Chicken
programme.desc: Ah Kam, a seasoned prostitute, gets locked inside an ATM vestibule with a thief. Both discover they are ill-fated in life and Ah Kam starts telling him her life story as a prostitute, from a teenage hooker to a PR girl in an upscale club in her thirties, as well as being a strip dancer, bar girl and masseuse.

programme.title: Those Were the Days
programme.desc: Director Wong despises Cantonese movies of the 60s, but accidentally travels back in time to that movie set. He meets Director Chu, who tells him he can return to modern time if someone likes the film he makes. Wong meets four classic movie stars and invites them to star in his new film, but it flops unexpectedly. Can Wong return to the present?

programme.title: Leio
programme.desc: An ex-singer Kao returns to his hometown for a funeral and takes part in a water drilling contest to save his drought-stricken hometown, as well as to win a million dollar cash prize. However, what Kao and other contestants do not realize is that there is a fierce and deadly beast lurking underground who wants to eat them all!

programme.title: American Dreams in China
programme.desc: During the economic reform period in the 80s, three undergraduates are brought together by a common ambition to live the American dream.

programme.title: Running On Karma
programme.desc: Andy Lau is a monk turned body-builder, with the gift of foreseeing people's lives. He befriends a female cop (Cecilia Cheung) and uses his gift to change the force of Karma and her destiny. The movie is ultimately a Buddhist parable about the nature of karma.

programme.title: Golden Job
programme.desc: A group of former mercenaries reunite to plan an epic heist: boosting a truckload of medicine held by a foreign intelligence agency to supply a refugee camp in need. When they find the truck is filled with stolen gold however, they realize they have been double-crossed by one of their own and putting the situation right will be an all-out war.

programme.title: Cloudy Mountain
programme.desc: When a decade-long tunnel project is about to complete, an earthquake strikes and leads to a series of subsidence and landslides. The tunnel and a nearby town are at stake. A retired soldier and his son step up to try and stop the disasters at source. Will the authority decide to blow up the tunnel to save the 160,000 people in town?

programme.title: The Sunny Side of the Street
programme.desc: Hassan is a Pakistani refugee boy whose father has died in a car accident. A local taxi driver, Yat, then helps him flee Hong Kong. In the process, the two gradually develop a father-son relationship, until Hassan discovers the shocking truth about his fathers death

programme.title: Chinese Odyssey 2002
programme.desc: Set in Ming Dynasty, young Emperor Zheng De escapes from the palace with his sister who disguised as a man. They run into a notorious wanderer who runs a restaurant with his boyish sister in Jiang Nan. The two pairs of siblings from vastly different social classes descend into an inescapable swirl of gender confusion, slapstick antics and love.

programme.title: Detective Chinatown 3
programme.desc: After the events in Bangkok and New York, Tang Ren and Qin Feng are invited to solve a murder case in Tokyo, but it turns out to be a challenge for the worlds best detectives. While the case has become complicated and confusing since the worlds top detective Q got involved, a hilarious challenge for the best detectives in Asia has just begun

programme.title: To Kill A Jaguar
programme.desc: Set in 1920s Shanghai, a village girl journeys to the big city in search of her father and meets her childhood friend Jaguar, who works for the mob boss Kam. In a world controlled by the mobs, it is a test of survival for all as Jaguar allies himself with ace gunman Ko Tang, to take over Kams empire.

programme.title: Two Con Men
programme.desc: Two Con Men is a wonderfully twisted, pseudo-romantic comedy in the vein of "Robin Hood" meets "The Sting". Starring Liang Tien as Clever Chan and Chang Ying (who's done over 400 films) as Tricky Ching, it's the age-old competition between a rookie con artist versus the ultimate, experienced flimflam man. It's a game Chen cannot afford to lose, because people's lives - including his own, hang in the balance of good versus evil.

programme.title: The Lizard
programme.desc: A seasoned burglar 'The Lizard' sets himself up against a corrupt police chief and announced that he will steal a diamond from a rich mans party. His real identity, which is discovered by the corrupt police chiefs granddaughter, is actually a young policeman who is doing it all for justice.

programme.title: Lover'S Rock
programme.desc: Pan Lei, winner the China Literary Award for three consecutive years, wrote and directed this film about the lives and loves of a fishing village. It starred the glorious Cheng Pei-pei in her first film as a woman (she had debuted in a mans role), and her much-lauded performance won her the prestigious Golden Accolade Award from the International Association Of Independent Producers a first for any Asian woman.

programme.title: King Cat
programme.desc: The son of the imperial teacher is beheaded by Justice Bao for corruption. Infuriated, the teacher hires assassins to kill Bao, who is saved by Zhan Zhao. Meanwhile, a royal treasure is stolen while a murder takes place. Bao is ordered to solve the case in ten days and Zhan quickly sets off to investigate. Will they solve the case in time?

programme.title: Forever And Ever
programme.desc: Ivy Ling Po plays a young scholar who is manipulated into marrying a nobleman's reluctant daughter. After marrying, he soon discovers the reason for her hesitation. She is stricken with a contagious disease. But, with the power of true love, their romance prevails.

programme.title: The Fantastic Magic Baby
programme.desc: The story is about the legendary Monkey King (Liu Chung-chun) teams up with Goddess of Mercy (Chao Li-chuan) and the Dragon Girl (Lung Nu) to battle the child god Hung Hai-erh (Ting Hua-chung),son of the Ox Demon (Hung Hai-erh) to rescue Tang Tseng, the Holy Pilgrim (Teng Chio-jen).

programme.title: Hex After Hex
programme.desc: Hell may have no fury like a woman scorned, but hell literally, really has no wrath like a lusting ghost scorned! Cult classic director Kuei Chih-hung shoots the works with this amazing horror romance starring muscular "Venom" Lo Meng.

programme.title: The Long Chase
programme.desc: Governor Yan is killed and his guard Fan identifies Kou as the assassin by his signature weapon, a dart. Kou is listed as a wanted man when he enters the city, but managed to escape arrest with the help of the innkeepers daughter. At the same time, Fan is attacked by a bandit who pretends to be Kou. What are the secret plots behind these attacks?

programme.title: The Bride Napping
programme.desc: A rich girl Yue Ying, together with her maid Chun Lan, encounter a poor scholar Bian Ji at a fte. Chun Lan realizes Yue Ying is in love with him, but mixes his identity with a bandit due to an old servants confusion, threatening the couples union. After a series of complications, misunderstandings and mismatches, Chun Lan finally saves the day.

programme.title: The Happiest Moment
programme.desc: In this horror anthology an old man dies from an overdose of virility pills, a cop goes on the run after extorting money from a hooker, and a mortician's ghost goes on the rampage.

programme.title: The House Of 72 Tenants
programme.desc: The 72 inhabitants of a dilapidated tenement live under the thumb of a heartless landlady and her sleazy husband. The arrival of a defiant new tenant however, changes their fate. The residents pool their resources together to prevent evictions, deflect targeted harassment by a corrupt policeman and ultimately prevent their home from being sold.

programme.title: Heaven And Hell
programme.desc: When an angel, Ling, decides to help his two friends who have fallen in love to escape from Heaven, he is sent to live as a human on earth as his punishment. Reincarnated as a cab driver, he sacrifices his own life to save another ill-fated couple and lands in hell, where he has to face off against the ghosts and demons to fight his way out!

programme.title: Hex Vs Witchcraft
programme.desc: A compulsive gambler with bad luck owes money to a violent gangster boss and trades his wife as down payment, causing her to leave him. As he decides to kill himself, a mysterious old man offers him a proposal to marry the ghost of his dead daughter in exchange for cash and an expensive apartment.

programme.title: Shaolin Abbot
programme.desc: Monk Chi San is sent by his Shaolin Master to learn a special kung fu from a Wu Dang priest. He gets embroiled in the fight between the Qing and Ming camps and has to gather disciples to rebuild the burnt Shaolin temple at the same time.

programme.title: Love With The Perfect Stranger
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, salesman Bao meets a rich girl, Jin Jin, who just broke up with her boyfriend. Two equally heartbroken strangers fall in love instantly and get married on impulse. The couple lives happily together until Jin Jin finds herself pregnant with her ex-boyfriends baby...

programme.title: Crippled Avengers
programme.desc: Chu Twin becomes crazy after his sons arms were chopped off. For no reason, he harms four people causing them various disabilities. The four disabled form a band to learn Kung Fu from a master, in order to take revenge on Chu Twin.

programme.title: Mist Over Dream Lake
programme.desc: A young girl Chen is sent away by her parents who are going through divorce, to stay with the Changs. On the Changs farm, she meets their two sons, the youngest daughter and a young artist, and spends a summer with them that she will never forget.

programme.title: The Champion
programme.desc: After years in prison, Lu Hu returns home to find himself set up by his ruthless brother Piao, who has taken over the family coal mine business and imprisoned their sister. Hu takes down Piao and saves his sister but their coal mine falls into the hands of a Japanese gang, which Hu and his sister must fight in order to get it back.

programme.title: Call Of The Sea
programme.desc: A young fisherman, Chin Hu is in love with his childhood friend Hsiao Yu. However, the only son of a town bully lusts after Hsiao Yus beauty and tries all possible ways to approach her. Chin Hu protects another woman from the bully one day, leading Hsiao Yu to misunderstand him and suspect that they are having an affair...

programme.title: The Sword Of Swords
programme.desc: The Sword Master passes on his sword to his disciple Lin before he dies. Another disciple Fang also eyes the sword and plots to take it away from Lin, destroying his family and blinding him in the process. Lin finally battles Fang for revenge and vows to reclaim his sword.

programme.title: Dead End
programme.desc: Uninhibited youth Chun meets a rich girl Wen when her car breaks down and drives her home. Chun falls in love with Wen but Wens brother dislikes him and forbids his sister to see him. He humiliates Chun and gets Chun beaten up, so Chun takes the pistol he has found accidentally on the street to Wens home and shoots her brother dead.

programme.title: The Shadow Whip
programme.desc: Three hundred thousand silver is robbed by a thief using a whip as the weapon. As it is a signature weapon used by a martial arts master named Shadow Whip, he is suspected and hunted. No one sees him after that. Fifteen years later, a young girl Yang shows up using the same weapon. Who is this girl and what has happened to Shadow Whip?

programme.title: My Son
programme.desc: Kuo, a polices son, blames his father for his mothers death. He has no job, spends time in night clubs and always gets into fights. One night, Kuo rescues Mei from being raped and they become friends. Kuo wants to support Mei and her family so he goes gambling hoping to gain more money but bad luck seems to be following them with tragic outcomes.

programme.title: Moods Of Love
programme.desc: This Song Dynasty period piece about how far one would go for love (or lust) has two tales. The first involves a devilish magistrate who tries to tempt a Buddhist monk out of his self-professed celibacy by hiring a pretty prostitute. The second is the tragic tale of an exploited young girl who is forced to work in an unscrupulous couples brothel.

programme.title: The Golden Sword
programme.desc: Swordswoman supreme Cheng Pei-pei (Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon) teams up with director/writer/actor Lo Wei (director of Bruce Lee and Jackie Chans first major movies) for an evocative and terrific Martial arts world adventure consisting of a missing blade and a deadly sect of men-hating swordswomen.

programme.title: Gossip Street
programme.desc: All neighbours gather to gossip in flat number 8 on the second floor of the Gossip Street apartment building! Most of the residents are common people from all walks of life and there is never a lack of laughter or sarcasm in the neighbourhood. However, when a local mobster wants to change the place into a gambling den, things get serious...

programme.title: The Thunderbolt Fist
programme.desc: A vicious Japanese judo expert wants to prove that Chinese are the sick people of Asia and sets out to sabotage and kill the best martial artists in dangerous tournaments. To save his son from this, the head of Ping Pai Boxing Institute sends him to the mountains to learn the powerful Thunderbolt Fist technique from master fighter, Red Butterfly.

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: Three young kung-fu warriors from wildly different backgrounds become students of Shaolin at the same temple. These three warriors are: Royal Guard Lo Lieh, fleeing soldier, Lo Meng, and villager, Wang Yu.

programme.title: The Wandering Swordsman
programme.desc: The wandering swordsman Yu Hsieh Erh has formidable sword skills and helps the poor by robbing from thieves and distributing the wealth. He meets a group of bandits who are planning to rob a convoy escorting some valuables and is tricked into participating in the robbery. Yu soon realizes his folly and returns to take revenge on the bandits.

programme.title: A Place To Call Home
programme.desc: Li Ching, star of Sweet is Revenge, plays one of three daughters, whose life is turned upside down when she discovers she is adopted. But things get even worse when she goes in search of her real mother. Finally, after what is almost a double tragedy, she realizes what so many knew all along: There's no place like home.

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: Notorious assassin Nieh Cheng has retired into hiding. However, when Premier Yen's family is massacred, he seeks out the reclusive swordsman and coaxes him into a final revenge mission in this epic story set in the Six Kingdom era.

programme.title: Inside The Forbidden City
programme.desc: Justice Bao discovers that Consort Lis new born son was swapped at birth and that she was expelled from the palace by Empress Liu twenty years ago. He sets Eunuch Guo up to confess his conspiracy with the Empress. Empress Liu is convicted for her act and Consort Li finally reunites with her son who is now the Emperor.

programme.title: Swift Sword
programme.desc: A righteous swordsman, Bai Yi Pang, seeks revenge on an evil clan but is crippled after being beaten up by them. Years later, a young man encounters Bai who is hiding in a cave. Bai decides to teach this determined young man his Swift Sword skills so that he can help Bai take revenge on the evil clan.

programme.title: The Kingdom And The Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Cheng Te meets country maiden Li Feng on a visit to Southern China. It was love at first sight and the emperor leaves with a promise that Li Feng would be his empress. One year later, when he sends for Li, her poor health cannot stand the arduous journey and she arrives just in time to die in the arms of her beloved...

programme.title: Hereafter
programme.desc: "Hereafter" tells the story of three people who are touched by death in different ways. George (Matt Damon) is a blue-collar American with a special connection to the afterlife dating from his childhood. On the other side of the world, Marie (Ccile De France), a French journalist, has a near-death experience that shakes her reality. And when London schoolboy Marcus (Frankie and George McLaren) loses the person closest to him, he desperately needs answers. Each seeking the truth, their lives will intersect, forever changed by what they believe might or must exist in the hereafter. Academy Award winner Clint Eastwood directs this haunting original tale from a screenplay by two-time Oscar nominee Peter Morgan.

programme.desc: This episode looks at how hot sauce, 'Shredded Wheat', coffee-chocolate bars and hard-boiled eggs are made on a large scale.

programme.desc: The Hebrides and The Dee - Robson Green and Jim Murray conclude their fly-fishing adventures as they head to the Isle of Lewis and Harris for some unforgettable fishing, then take part in a 24-hour non-stop competition on the River Dee.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep1
programme.desc: An all-American candy company makes 200,000 packages of red licorice every day; a zippy mayonnaise packs the punch of spicy Sriracha; 40,000 Turkish bourekas are produced every day; and Laceys feature a chocolate centre sandwiched between two wafer-thin cookies.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep2
programme.desc: 1.8 million cherry chews are produced from just one single batch; massive silos of wheat are transformed into 'elbow' macaroni pasta; a continental cranberry cheesecake first started as a Christmas experiment; and meet chakri, the exotic southeast Asian snack that's hand-twirled and fried to crispy perfection.

programme.title: A Perfect Planet S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Volcano - A look at how without volcanoes, there would be no life on Earth. Although destructive, magma from the planet's molten core builds land, and mineral-rich ash from eruptions fertilises the surface.

programme.desc: Indonesia - Joanna Lumley begins her epic journey in Indonesia.

programme.title: Exploration Volcano S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Ridge of Fire Part 1 - An inconspicuous hill on the Spanish Island of La Palma bursts open, releasing an avalanche of lava. programme.title: Universe S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Black Holes: Heart of Darkness - Professor Brian Cox journeys across the vastness of time and space.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep5
programme.desc: There's a waterfall of chocolate at a California candy factory; meet the saucy squad behind mountains of cannelloni; find out what it takes to make rice noodles by the truckload; and a hardworking team takes the hassle out of preparing butternut squash.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep6
programme.desc: From tree to bottle, follow the amazing story of maple syrup; there's a 'tower of power' behind a delectable Almond Roca butter toffee popcorn; a British Columbia candy company is giving Turkish Delight a thoroughly modern twist; and find out the secret behind apples that taste like grapes.

programme.title: Earth's Great Rivers S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Yukon - The Yukon is a river of beauty and dangerous extremes - a place where the 'call of the wild' is still strong. Home to grizzlies, moose and salmon, it lies at the heart of a vast northern wilderness.

programme.title: Coast New Zealand S2 Ep1
programme.desc: West Coast - Maritime archaeologist Matt Carter explores the West Coast's treacherous sea-faring history, while Scottish historian and archaeologist Neil Oliver discovers a secret beach and goes out on a limb on coastal cliffs.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Hurricane Florence brings biblical flooding to North Carolina, a magnitude 7 earthquake rocks Alaska, and a surfer crashes in Nazare's colossal waves.

programme.title: Robson Green's Extreme Fishing Challenge S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Mexico - This challenge sees Robson head to Mexico for a competitive 'fish off' against locals.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 Ep7
programme.desc: The Waterhole - While many think of coastlines and deserts when they think of Australia, there are other secret pockets of paradise that are home to some of the most intriguing and iconic of its animals: the waterholes. The freshwater wetlands and waterholes in the tropical far North of the country are among the most diverse ecosystems, hosting an extraordinary array of birds, insects, fish and freshwater crocodiles.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Punks Strike Back - After the dry season lowers the waters, siblings Kimba and Maya risk crossing the river to search for their parents. They run the gauntlet of the densest populations of crocs and hippos in Africa, and face an even greater threat on the other side.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Cambodia: Hidden Refuges - Cambodia is a country that lies almost entirely within the Mekong basin, flanked by Thailand, Laos and Vietnam. The Mekong travels the length of the country entering in the north and tracking south, cutting the region into two halves. Every habitat here is somehow linked to the Mekongs waters. Whether it be its tributaries which connect and traverse much of the countries terrain, or the seasonal flooding that influences landscapes miles beyond its reach.

programme.title: Rooted 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Giant - In a misty South African forest grows a six hundred year old Outeniqua Yellowwood. At forty meters tall, she towers above the canopy and is one of the few remaining of her kind. Follow her captivating story, unique as the ecosystem in her branches.

programme.title: Rooted 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Rock Splitter - The Namaqua Rock Fig Tree stands rooted on the slope of a rocky hill in Namaqualand, South Africa. It is the ultimate survivor, able to withstand the unforgiving conditions in a landscape facing ever rising temperatures and less and less rainfall each year.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Creatures of the Night - Flying squirrels leaping through the air is quite a sight - especially for researchers who know theyre not supposed to be here. The Southern flying squirrel, typically found along the shores of Lake Erie, is now moving its territory up towards Lake Ontario and beyond thanks to warmer winters.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Sanctuary - Theres strength in numbers. Especially in the wild. For many species, its the very reason why individuals come together. Protecting the empire is imperative to survival. For these animals, protection means isolation finding sanctuary from the threats outside their boundaries.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Horses of the Sun - Grvys zebras population has dropped by 50% in less than 20 years. Environmentalists say that if we arent vigilant, they could disappear all together. Lewa Conservancy is at the heart of efforts to protect the species so that they can replenish their numbers

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Secret Life of Bugs & Butterflies - At first glance, the tropical forests of Australia seem empty and still. But look closer and they are packed with life. Few places in the country contain such a high diversity of insects as here. From the canopy to the forest floor, insects cram into every space and they must fight to survive. In this great battle for life, insects have adopted extraordinary survival strategies: jumping spiders disguise themselves as ants; ants use their larvae as glue-guns to build elaborate tree-top camps; what look like leaves are in fact stick-insects.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 Ep7
programme.desc: The Waterhole - While many think of coastlines and deserts when they think of Australia, there are other secret pockets of paradise that are home to some of the most intriguing and iconic of its animals: the waterholes. The freshwater wetlands and waterholes in the tropical far North of the country are among the most diverse ecosystems, hosting an extraordinary array of birds, insects, fish and freshwater crocodiles.

programme.desc: Cambodia: Hidden Refuges - Cambodia is a country that lies almost entirely within the Mekong basin, flanked by Thailand, Laos and Vietnam. The Mekong travels the length of the country entering in the north and tracking south, cutting the region into two halves. Every habitat here is somehow linked to the Mekongs waters. Whether it be its tributaries which connect and traverse much of the countries terrain, or the seasonal flooding that influences landscapes miles beyond its reach.

programme.title: Rooted 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Giant - In a misty South African forest grows a six hundred year old Outeniqua Yellowwood. At forty meters tall, she towers above the canopy and is one of the few remaining of her kind. Follow her captivating story, unique as the ecosystem in her branches.

programme.title: Rooted 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Rock Splitter - The Namaqua Rock Fig Tree stands rooted on the slope of a rocky hill in Namaqualand, South Africa. It is the ultimate survivor, able to withstand the unforgiving conditions in a landscape facing ever rising temperatures and less and less rainfall each year.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Sanctuary - Theres strength in numbers. Especially in the wild. For many species, its the very reason why individuals come together. Protecting the empire is imperative to survival. For these animals, protection means isolation finding sanctuary from the threats outside their boundaries.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Back from the Dead - Sometimes animals get a second chance. Like the majestic elk, which went extinct in Ontario thanks to habitat loss and over-aggressive hunting. But a few years ago, hundreds of elk were brought back, to re-populate the province in four different areas. Some floundered because of new, aggressive local predators. But a colony of elk in Burwash, on a former prison ground, is thriving.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Secret Life of Bugs & Butterflies - At first glance, the tropical forests of Australia seem empty and still. But look closer and they are packed with life. Few places in the country contain such a high diversity of insects as here. From the canopy to the forest floor, insects cram into every space and they must fight to survive. In this great battle for life, insects have adopted extraordinary survival strategies: jumping spiders disguise themselves as ants; ants use their larvae as glue-guns to build elaborate tree-top camps; what look like leaves are in fact stick-insects.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 Ep7
programme.desc: The Waterhole - While many think of coastlines and deserts when they think of Australia, there are other secret pockets of paradise that are home to some of the most intriguing and iconic of its animals: the waterholes. The freshwater wetlands and waterholes in the tropical far North of the country are among the most diverse ecosystems, hosting an extraordinary array of birds, insects, fish and freshwater crocodiles.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Punks Strike Back - After the dry season lowers the waters, siblings Kimba and Maya risk crossing the river to search for their parents. They run the gauntlet of the densest populations of crocs and hippos in Africa, and face an even greater threat on the other side.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Cambodia: Hidden Refuges - Cambodia is a country that lies almost entirely within the Mekong basin, flanked by Thailand, Laos and Vietnam. The Mekong travels the length of the country entering in the north and tracking south, cutting the region into two halves. Every habitat here is somehow linked to the Mekongs waters. Whether it be its tributaries which connect and traverse much of the countries terrain, or the seasonal flooding that influences landscapes miles beyond its reach.

programme.title: Rooted 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Giant - In a misty South African forest grows a six hundred year old Outeniqua Yellowwood. At forty meters tall, she towers above the canopy and is one of the few remaining of her kind. Follow her captivating story, unique as the ecosystem in her branches.

programme.title: Rooted 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Rock Splitter - The Namaqua Rock Fig Tree stands rooted on the slope of a rocky hill in Namaqualand, South Africa. It is the ultimate survivor, able to withstand the unforgiving conditions in a landscape facing ever rising temperatures and less and less rainfall each year.

programme.title: Baby Animals 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Mini Giants - Elephants, gorillas, rhinos, and bison are among the largest and most imposing land-dwelling mammals, but they all start out as helpless infants. See how babies from each species find their way to becoming giants.

programme.title: Baby Animals 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Mother's Darlings - Not all infants in the animal kingdom get to have a good mother. But these are the stories of the lucky ones, from a ring-tailed lemur who learns everything from its mom to a tiny orangutan that receives a constant supply of motherly cuddles.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Migration - Epic flights, adventurous sea journeys and exhausting road trips all play a key part in the lives of many species. These empires travel in search of food, shelter or a mate. But booking and organizing travel is no easy feat when those plans involve hundreds even thousands of individuals.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Vanishing Wilderness - Kenya's growing human population is taking land and resources away from wildlife. The squeeze is creating increasing numbers of conflicts between humans and animals, and is one of the biggest issues in African conservation.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Hollywoods Held Hostage - During the last few weeks of the dry season, the prides stick close to the only available water in the river. But in Luangwa, that proximity spells danger - especially when the scent of a hippo kill compels the Hollywoods to cross the river.

programme.title: Arabian Seas 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Island Feast - Off the coast of Oman, summer weather drives nutrients in from the ocean depths where they meet the Arabian sun, causing an explosion of life. Smaller fish spawn, filling the waters with eggs. This creates a buffet predators just cant resist.

programme.desc: Growing Pains - Experience a roller coaster of emotions and growing pains as the sanctuarys orangutans move through six grades toward their release into the wild. Discover how Dillas fate suddenly changes, and watch as big boy Beni goes on an unwelcome diet.

programme.desc: The More the Merrier - Watch fur seals give birth by the thousands, black bear cubs wrestle with their buddies, and meerkat pups forge bonds by sharing choresall proving that growing up in the animal kingdom is easier when you have numbers on your side.

programme.title: Baby Animals 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Fresh Meat - Infancy isnt all fun and games. Some animals must hit the ground running to avoid becoming dinner for predators. Take an in-depth look at what life is like for newborn animals that must learn fast your die young.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Jungle Killers - A jaguar stalks the riverbank. A venomous snake is on the move. A Colombian tarantula waits for night fall. Watch as these fierce predators prowl through the jungle and bite into their next great meal.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 Ep5
programme.desc: A Place in the Wild - Kenya takes a major step with the opening of its first community-run rhino sanctuary in the heart of Samburu territory. The threat to Kenyas rhinos from armed, illegal poaching gangs is the highest it's been in 40 years, which makes the sanctuary vital.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Next Dynasty - The all-female Hollywood pride have been in exile after being attacked by the four Nomad brothers. But their leader, Ava, decides to lead her family south to the heart of their territory for a showdown with the Nomads.

programme.title: Arabian Seas 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Defenders of the Reef - Its summer in the Gulf of Oman. The scorching Arabian sun heats the shallow waters to 86 degrees boosting the growth of algae across a vast coral reef. This attracts thousands of hungry herbivores creating a fish versus fish turf war.

programme.title: The Rock Zone!
programme.desc: You are now entering the rock zone! Expect nothing but the biggest, loudest, hottest rock tunes to ever exist!

programme.title: MTV Family Legacy

programme.title: Sampled
programme.desc: Bas and some of his "Dreamville" crew, The Fiends, land for a long layover in Medellin after a 30-hour journey from his show in Latvia

programme.desc: Palomino Bluffs Riding Academy - On their first day at Palomino Bluffs, the girls are determined to make a good impression. Cue the beachfront race and a daring rescue!

programme.desc: Crow Pox/Faking Ammends - A prank leads to "crow pox" for the FAST snails, who make a treacherous climb to find a cure; Burn and her hippie sister try to end their rivalry.

programme.desc: Lost and Found / In the Park In the Dark - The Community Center's Lost and Found is full and it's up to the gang to use their detective skills and return the lost items to their original owners. / Rodney only needs one more bird on his birdwatching list, but the only problem is that it only comes out at night! Team Zenko must help Rodney face his fear of the dark so he can get the last picture for his collection.

programme.desc: Fleshbeast / Time Leafer - The Mighty Ones are terrorized by the human baby that runs amuck through the yard, but Rocksy is drawn to its power. / Everyone thinks Leaf has gotten loopy, but his theories about time travel might just be what the Mighty Ones need to return to their home.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep45
programme.desc: Written By - When Dulcinea searches for clues on the Crown of Souls, she finds the author of the Wee Compendium book and holds him hostage until she gets answers

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep46
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Confusing Crisis Of The Conniving Captive - Melvin isn't exactly their friend ... but it's not like George and Harold can just let him be held captive by diabolical Biglyans, right? Right?!?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep47
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Aggravated Assault Of The Alien Armada - Oh, the indignity: George and Harold are forced to perform spa treatments on gigantic Biglyans. Also, Dr. Fitzgibbons reveals a shocking secret.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep37
programme.desc: Glamping / A Flower for Poppy - Branch is excited to take the Troll children camping with him. But when Guy Diamond arrives at the camp site with glamping gear, the kids decide they prefer Guys plush method of camping to Branchs insistence on roughing it./Poppys the most amazing gift-giver in Troll Village, and the Snack Pack are determined to finally gift her something as good as her birthday. So when Poppy off-handedly mentions her favorite rare flower, her friends set out to find it for her- but who will get to gift it?

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep38
programme.desc: The Partier's Apprentice / Hair Ball - Guy is running himself ragged trying to be the life of the party for every party in Troll Village. When Poppy suggests he train an apprentice, it seems like the solution to his problems! Until his apprentice starts to surpass his partying skills/When Smidge accidentally agrees to go with both Milton and Guy to the Trolls fanciest event, the Hair Ball, she must navigate the difficulties of her situation with help from her friends.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep42
programme.desc: Night Owls - Boss arranges a sleepover with Quiet Psycho Baby to get access to her father the Mayor's day planner, hoping to plant his own pro-baby agenda. However, staying up all night has the unexpected consequence of delusional over-tiredness! Tim sneaks into an art film and decides he has to be a grown-up now, so Mom and Dad try to "kid" him up again.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep43
programme.desc: OCB - Boss' reign as CEO is threatened by a charming, multiple-dimpled Outside Consultant Baby (OCB) hired by the Board of Directors. Boss, furious that OCB will ruin Baby Corp with his poorly thought out ideas, tries to distract him while Staci adds the finishing touches to a project that will make OCB unnecessary, The 24 Hour Diaper.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep99
programme.desc: Poppy's Big Race - It is the day of the annual Flowertot Race. Poppy is reluctant to enter as she always loses her way. Fifi and Bumble help her train for the big race, but will she win?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep100
programme.desc: Blueberry Hunt - Fifi and Bumble are off to pick all the ripe blueberries off the bush. But when they get there all the berries have disappeared. Who could have taken them?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep101
programme.desc: Snowtime For Pip - All Pip wants to do is play in the snow. Fifi tries to help him out, and come up with a brilliant idea how they can without it actually snowing!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep102
programme.desc: Pip And The Wizard - Stingo and Slugsy put on a magic show. But will anybody find out that he is a fraud?

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep21
programme.desc: How Can We Make Music For Mimi? - Mimi has lost the handle to her music box and can't hear her music. Jess works out how to make instruments and get all the friends involved in making a little orchestra and performing a fantastic song to cheer mimi up.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep22
programme.desc: How Can We Find Sammy Snail? - Jess helps Mimi to find her little frend Sammy Snail who's gone missing. They check all the places she's seen him before and work out that if they follow the silvery train it leads right to him.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep23
programme.desc: Why Won't My Kite Fly? - Jess is given his very first kite by Mimi. It's very special indeed. He can't wait to fly it! But first he has to work out HOW!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep24
programme.desc: How Did A Dandelion Seed Get Into Mimi's Garden? - Mimi is shocked to find a dandelion plant in her lovely pink and purple garden. She didn't plant it there herself, so how on earth did the dandelion get there? Jess is determined to find out and in the process they work out how some seeds are transported by birds, some in the coats of animals and some in the wind. Jess says goodbye and asks the children to see how many different types of seeds and flowers they can spot.

programme.title: Olivia Ep27
programme.desc: Olivia The Nature Photographer - After snapping some great photos of her cat Edwin, Olivia thinks she's ready to photograph some real wild animals. She and Julian camp out in the backyard to wait for some, and sure enough they track down a mysterious animal in the bushes. But is it really a wild beast?

programme.title: Olivia Ep28
programme.desc: The Two Olivias - There's a new girl in Olivia's class and her name is...Olivia! Confusion ensues, and Olivia (the original Olivia) can't believe that she shares her name with another person. After a brief stint calling herself Pam, Olivia eventually decides that a two Olivia town might not be so bad after all.

programme.title: Olivia Ep29
programme.desc: Olivia's Day At The Office - When Father takes Olivia and Ian to bring your kids to work day, Olivia is looking forward to a fun day with dad at the office. But when Father is given a new deadline for a big project, Olivia hatches a plan to help him out. First, however they have to track down Ian's missing frog.

programme.title: Olivia Ep30
programme.desc: Olivia Helps Mother Nature - After learning about the environment, Olivia is on a mission to recycle, cut down on waste, and conserve energy. But she just can't get Ian to turn off his light at night. Either she'll have to find a way for Ian to fall asleep without it, or else find a sustainable alternative

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep21
programme.desc: Why Rhino Charges - You see there was a time when Rhino didn't charge and he couldn't see very well at all. Poor old Rhino really wanted to be invited to the Dance of the Horns up on the plains with Buffalo and all the other horned animals. But Rhino didn't have a horn, so he wasn't allowed. The Monkeys decide to help Rhino and make him a horn from a piece of old wood. But when Rhino wakes up he doesn't know what it is. Aargh! Thing on the end of my nose! CHAAaarge!' And that's Why Rhino Charges. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep22
programme.desc: Why Caterpillar Is Never In A Hurry - You see Caterpillar was never in a hurry. When all the animals were racing around Tinga Tinga getting ready for the Best-dressed parade, Caterpillar was happy to sit in a tree and munch on leaves saying Po-le, po-le, slowly, slowly, good things come to those who wait'. Then one day the rains come and Caterpillar disappears into a cocoon. What's happening?' questions Elephant. Wait and see' says Tortoise wisely Wait and See'. Then Caterpillar transforms into the most beautiful butterfly ever!... But who wins the Best-dressed parade? Tales from Africa

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep23
programme.desc: Why Lion Roars - You see there was a time when Lion had lost his roar. Crocodile was snapping at all the animals in the Waterhole and Lion opened his big mouth but nothing came out! Tiny Flea tells Lion that if he dares to enter the Great Cave of Tinga Tinga then maybe he will find his roar. Lion plucks up courage and goes into the Great Cave. He roars with all his might, but a bigger roar comes back! Lion stands strong. He roars again and an even bigger roar comes back. Lion's very own Echo! He has found his roar! From that day on Lion always roars with pride, showing any beast who's the real King of Tinga Tinga. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep24
programme.desc: Why Zebra Has Stripes - Zebra was once very easy to spot in Tinga Tinga as he was bright white all over. This very annoying as all he wanted was to be left alone to munch on yummy grass and get fat. One day, Eagle arrives at the Watering Hole with a new pair of sharp talons saying that she found them in the Great Cave. The animals excitedly rush to find something for themselves. Zebra accompanies Tortoise and the Monkeys into the Cave where they discover the last remaining item; a plain black coat. The Monkeys persuade Zebra to try it on. By holding in his stomach, Zebra manages to get the coat on but it is extremely tight and the black coat starts to rip. In fact, the more Zebra eats the more the coat rips until Zebra has a stripy black and white coat which he is extremely proud of. Not only that, his new stripes make him very difficult to spot amongst the tall grasses of the plains. Finally, Zebra can eat as much grass as he likes and not be spotted by the other animals!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep3
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Horrible Hostilities of the Homework Hydra - When George and Harold go back in time to stop the invention of homework, they realize they also eliminated the most important thing in the world: comic books

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep4
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Vexing Villainy of the Vile Vimpire - When Erica makes fun of George and Harolds latest and greatest comic, they make a comic about her becoming a vampire

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep45
programme.desc: Baby Boss - Mom and Dad are panicking after Gigi noticed Boss isn't growing, so Boss "puts himself under", taking a special formula that will turn him int a regular baby long enough to pass a Doctor's checkup. However, with Boss gone, all the villains from this season see it as the perfect time to strike Baby Corp, leaving Staci to hold the floodgates.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep46
programme.desc: Boom Baby - Looking to trim costs, Boss unknowingly fires Boom Baby, a super-undercover Baby Corp worker who displays to parents how unsafe things are by pratfalling on them and crying for attention. Convinced he's the victim of a conspiracy, Boom leaves a wake of parent worry in his path, forcing Boss to stop him.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep8
programme.desc: Golem - The Golem, a giant clay enemy Puss has been outrunning for years, comes to San Lorenzo. With Artephius' help, Puss may be able to defeat his foe.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep8
programme.desc: Eye'll Be Watching You / Sorry Not Sorry - Convinced Troll Village is dangerous Branch makes a security plantPoppy creates an apology monster out of Gristle when teaching him how to make amends.

programme.desc: A Welsh Trick & Treat - Its Halloween time and the Wanderers get a WanderPost from Odlulu issuing a challenge: Come to my Haunted House in Wales if you dare! Wally and Wenda, arent scared by Odlulu and Fritzs attempt at creating a haunted house with goofy Halloween decorations. So Odlulu uses the magical Haunted House Key to bring a few of the decorations to life.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep16
programme.desc: Fast Franks Fixit / Tail-Kwondo - When Tag is left in charge of the Pawston Pawtomotive for the day, Frank and Beans open up a rival garage and take all the business. But when all the cars around Pawston break down because of Frank's shoddy mechanic work, Tag and Scooch have to go around town to fix all his mistakes. \ Scooch wants to be a Tail-kwondo master like his hero, Master Wag, but he can't break a biscuit with his tail. Tag helps train him (and his tail), and they even track down Master Wag who gives Scooch a good luck charm. But when Scooch loses the good luck charm before his tail-kwondo test, he needs to find a way to believe in himself.

programme.desc: Whimsy Wasps / Freeze Tag - When a type of insect (Whimsy Wasps) become attracted to Trolls Village due to the Trolls joyful lifestyles, Branch must convince them to tone it down in order to avoid being descended upon by a swarm of the wasps./ For the first time in Trolls Village, a game of freeze tag has broken out without the tagger declaring themselves. Poppy races to discover the identity of the mysterious tagger, before all of Trolls Village ends up frozen

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep40
programme.desc: The Fast and the Friendliest / Much Achoo About Nothing - Branch is training Keith for the big Flyer Bug Race, but he gets too caught up in his competition with Creek and his protg./ When it appears Mr. Dinkles has developed an allergy to Biggie, Biggie must find a solution fast.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep44
programme.desc: Chicago - Boss and family go on Spring Break to visit his grandparents in the big city of Chicago. Boss uses the trip to test his business mettle, by getting in a promotion war at a real big adult company. And when a department store refuses to let Gigi and Tim return an item, they wind up unionizing the entire sales force.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep45
programme.desc: Baby Boss - Mom and Dad are panicking after Gigi noticed Boss isn't growing, so Boss "puts himself under", taking a special formula that will turn him int a regular baby long enough to pass a Doctor's checkup. However, with Boss gone, all the villains from this season see it as the perfect time to strike Baby Corp, leaving Staci to hold the floodgates.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep20
programme.desc: Gongmen City Hustle - Po and the Kids make it to Gongmen City in search of the contact they heard has some info on the dirigible crash. Meanwhile, Xiao, mourning the presumed death of her new panda friends, takes off into the woods and meets a new friend.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep14
programme.desc: Team Astrid - After Dagur attacks Berk, Astrid trauns a crew of back-up Dragon riders to battle back, although no one anticipates how soon the strike will come.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep46
programme.desc: The Longest Day - During the week of the Midnight Sun where the sun doesn't set for a week, Hiccup must deal with sleep deprivation and a dangerous new dragon.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep24
programme.desc: Clickety Clacks / Rocksy's Thing - Rocksys talent goes to her head when she and Berry accidentally invent tap dancing. / Rocksy finds one end of a shoelace and tasks her friends with helping her free it so she can have a thing of her very own.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep46
programme.desc: Fancy Feast - When Puss, Dulcinea and Uli search for a book filled with secrets of the Crown of Souls, they sneak into a mansion and trick an ogre named Tranche

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep103
programme.desc: Grubby Ahoy - Grubby has got stuck on Aunt Tulip's boat. Can anybody save him before he floats away?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep104
programme.desc: Stingo Has Visitors - Stingo's tree house has been invaded by ants. Fifi is determined to get rid of them, as she doesn't want Stingo and Slugsy staying with her a moment longer than necessary!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep105
programme.desc: Flowertot Fairies - The twins are sure they have seen fairies in the garden and set out on a hunt to prove it to Fifi. Will they find any?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep106
programme.desc: Dandelions - The twins inadvertently ruin Fifi's garden while playing a game. Can they and the other tots make it better before Fifi finds out?

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep25

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep26

programme.desc: Wish List - Monty talks about his friend Barnaby who seems to have every toy imaginable. This leads to him and Jimmy Jones to wonder what it would be like to have whatever you want.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep38
programme.desc: Copycat - Bluey's having fun copying everything Dad says and does, but the game takes a serious turn when Bluey finds a hurt budgie and they have to make an emergency trip to the vet.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep9
programme.desc: Betty's First Day - The Squirrels are having fun trying out games but are surprised to find out that Betty didn't always enjoy playing.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep8
programme.desc: The Hat Badge - King Tiger interrupts the Squirrels' quiet time when he turns up to the Clubhouse with a magic hat on instead of his crown.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep7
programme.desc: Tag's First Day - The Squirrels are crafting in the Clubhouse when Betty saves Tag from throwing water across the table instead of glitter.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep32
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: New Species - The team goes on a jungle expedition to find a mysterious creature. But while they race to discover a brand new species, something seems to be watching them from the treetops.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep31
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Lightning Bolt Blackout - When lightning strikes Academy Island, it causes a power cut. Can the Go Jetters rescue their trapped friends without the power they need to call for Click-ons?

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep37
programme.desc: The Adventure - Princesses, horses and magic wands. Bluey and Chloe can play any role they want, when they embark on an adventure to save their playground kingdom from the Greedy Queen.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep36
programme.desc: Backpackers - Mum and Dad are going on an adventure wearing the kids as their cheeky backpacks! Seeing the sights and buying street food, backpacking is a blast - until they lose their passports.

programme.title: Andy's Global Adventures S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Grizzly Bears - Andy, Jen and Scout head off on a global adventure to Sierra Nevada in California, searching for a mother grizzly bear and her cubs.

programme.title: My Pet and Me: Teeny Tiny Creatures S2 Ep13
programme.desc: Beetles - Henry wants to know all about brilliant beetles. Chantelle is with farm vet Dr Claire Whittle in Shropshire looking for some teeny tiny creatures who love to recycle.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S3 Ep7
programme.desc: A Fruitful Day - Stepping Stones and swashbubbles are in store for Georgia, Ejika, Redha and Ellie.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep6
programme.desc: The Library Badge - When the Squirrels can't figure out if fish have noses, Duggee shows them his library. But when the Squirrels realise no-one is visiting it, they have an idea...

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep5
programme.desc: Happy's First Day - Happy has always loved the water. But while swimming around in his paddling pool at the playhouse, Duggee reminds the Squirrels that there was a time when Happy feared water!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep4
programme.desc: The Spot the Difference Badge - Duggee looks different, but what is it? By playing some looking games, the Squirrels learn how best to spot the difference.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep30

programme.desc: Ho Ho Snowman! - Henry becomes unhappy over the thick snow lying over Sodor; Charlie decides to show Henry that snow can be fun.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep49
programme.desc: Dr. Funny Bones - Following advice from Gran, Monty tells Stan a joke to keep his mind preoccupied from a splinter in his finger. This leads him to wonder if laughter really is the best medicine.

programme.title: Dinopaws S1 Ep42

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep3

programme.desc: Shell Games / Senior Discount - Patrick discovers that the rock he lives under is actually a sea turtle who overslept. // Old Man Jenkins disrupts business as usual at the Krusty Krab, but Mr. Krabs can't find a way to kick him out.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep252
programme.desc: Mind the Gap / Dirty Bubble Returns - Squidward closes the gap in SpongeBob's teeth, which causes a dramatic and unexpected change in his demeanor. // The newly reformed "Clean Bubble" takes a dishwashing job at the Krusty Krab, where he is tempted by the grime.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep253
programme.desc: Jolly Lodgers / Biddy Sitting - Squidward packs his bags after his house gets infested, but a different kind of pest waits at his hotel. // SpongeBob and Patrick get tricked into babysitting a grouchy old lady, who does all she can to escape.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Stair Wars / Enemies a la Mode - Patrick and GrandPat try to pass each other on the stairs, leading to a ludicrous conflict. // The members of the Star family each confront their own absurd rivalries.

programme.desc: Lost in Couch - Patrick loses the remote in the cushions, so he journeys into the couch to track it down.

programme.desc: Kung Shoes - In an attempt to get out of training, Po buys some enchanted shoes that will heighten his kung fu abilities. Unfortunately for Po, the magical shoes are evil and will soon put him and all those around him in great danger.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S03 Ep318
programme.desc: Sozin's Comet Part 1: The Phoenix King - Aang finds out that Ozai plans to burn down the Earth Kingdom with an airship fleet. He disappears during the night, having sleepwalked onto a mysterious moving island.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep311
programme.desc: P.E.L.T. - Skipper's losing it. He has to prove he can still lead the squad.

programme.desc: King Me / Private and the Winky Factory - King Julien's archrival, Clemson, returns in another attempt to claim the lemur crown. // Private's favorite treat, the Peanut Butter Winky, is going the way of the dinosaur.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Best Foes / Night of the Vesuviuses - Kowalski invents an enemy detector but it doesn't work. Old enemies are now friends & old friends are now enemies. // The annual Zoo Snooze is here! This year the Vesuvius Twins buy up all the tickets. The zoosters plan to exact revenge on the twins.

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Stank Breath / Frog Day Afternoon - Buhdeuce has to deal with some awesomely bad stank breath that leads to some awesomely bad trouble. // SwaySway and Buhdeuce teach their pet Jelly how to fetch, and she accidentally fetches a monster egg.

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Ice Ice Baby - After getting caught in a snowstorm, Evan accidentally damages the snow ogre meant to protect local villagers and is made to stand trial for his crime.

programme.title: Ollie's Pack S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Ollie In The House / The Ollie Files - After getting grounded, Ollie is stuck alone in the house with no backpack and an angry moth monster. // Ollie panics when two nosy government agents show up to investigate possible monsters in Portshill.

programme.title: Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Mystic Library / The Purple Game - The Turtles plumb the depths of a mysterious hidden library in search of a way to rescue Mayhem. // A competitive new video game has swept New York and Donnie will do anything to reach rank number one.

programme.desc: Boatin' Down the River / Pretty in Punk - The kids build a homemade raft to rescue mysterious castaways. // The Dicksons are seduced by fame and fortune and Sanjay and Craig are to blame.

programme.desc: Dorg Gets a Pimple / Dorg the Dorgnificent - Desperate for a good yearbook photo, Dorg asks Patronella to magically remove the pimple on his chin. // When Dorg tries casting a spell at his sister's birthday party and Patronella turns into a tiger, he learns that magic really does take patience.

programme.title: Fanboy & Chum Chum S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Norse-ing Around / The Janitor's Apprentice - Fanboy and Chum Chum discover a frozen Viking in their icebox and decide to help him "achieve glory" so he can get into Valhalla. // As punishment, Fanboy and Chum Chum are told that they must help Janitor Poopatine clean up the school.

programme.title: T.U.F.F. Puppy S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Kid Stuff / Super Duper Crime Busters - T.U.F.F. agents are not allowed to use their blasters in front of children. Snaptrap uses this rule to his own advantage. // A documentary-style TV show spends a day profiling T.U.F.F. and its super-star agents.

programme.title: Winx Club S05 Ep523
programme.desc: The Shark's Eye - Daphne tells Bloom about a nymph Politea, who is under a dark spell. Politea's Sirenix power could be what Tritannus needs to become Emperor of the Infinite Ocean, but Darcy and Stormy are determined to keep this from happening.

programme.title: Winx Club S05 Ep524
programme.desc: Saving Paradise Bay - The Magic Dimension's future is hanging by a thread. Bloom and Sky lead the Sovereign Council in agreement to unite and fight Tritannus. But first the Winx must find the Breath of the Ocean in order to save a polluted bay.

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty S01 Ep123
programme.desc: Smart Cookie / Disappearing Act - Yana eats a cookie to level up her smarts, but realizes it's her heart that makes her special. // Miguel learns a new trick, which gets him completely lost.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep224
programme.desc: Squid Noir / Scavenger Pants - When his clarinet goes missing, Squidward must become a hardboiled detective to track it down. // Squidward sends SpongeBob and Patrick on an increasingly difficult scavenger hunt to get them out of his hair.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep225
programme.desc: Cuddle E. Hugs / Pat the Horse - SpongeBob's new friend is a giant fluffy hamster. There's one problem, though: no one else can see him! // Patrick wants to be a horse!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep226
programme.desc: Chatterbox Gary / Don't Feed the Clowns - Gary has a pet translation collar, and he's talking up a storm. Everyone loves it... except for Squidward! // When a small clown gets left behind by the circus, SpongeBob takes the hapless harlequin under his wing.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep227
programme.desc: Drive Happy / Old Man Patrick - SpongeBob can't drive, but you don't need a license to operate a self-driving car! // Patrick thinks he's an old man, so it's up to SpongeBob to remind him how much fun being a kid can be!

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep401
programme.desc: The Toy - A favorite toy of Theodore's is lost on a rafting trip but then mysteriously shows up at the house, and it's alive!

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep401
programme.desc: Bloodline - When the boys send Dave's DNA sample to a testing lab the results show he's related to Jack The Ripper!

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep402
programme.desc: Theodore's Calling - Miss Croner attempts to help Theodore discover his true calling in life.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Fool's Gold / Flight Plan - When they find a treasure map, the Casagrandes go on a wild search for Pancho Villa's gold. // Frida and Carlos go on a fancy plane ride, but Carl and CJ try to sneak on for an adventure of their own.

programme.title: The Loud House S04 Ep402
programme.desc: Power Play with the Casagrandes / Room for Improvement with the Casagrandes - When a high utility bill threatens Hector and Rosa's annual trip, Ronnie Anne spearheads an effort to lower usage. // Desperate for their own space, Ronnie Anne and Sid find a hidden room and try to keep it a secret from the other tenants.

programme.title: The Loud House S04 Ep403
programme.desc: Roll Model with the Casagrandes / No Show with the Casagrandes - When Carl witnesses Ronnie Anne save a dog, he becomes obsessed with being just like his newfound hero. // Ronnie Anne secretly starts watching her family's favorite telenovela after refusing to watch it with them.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep609
programme.desc: The Last Laugh / Driver's Dread - Luan thinks Mr. Coconuts is out for revenge when she replaces him with Lola in her act. // Hoping to drive out to the outlets to meet Lori, Leni ooks for alternative ways to get her driver's license.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep258
programme.desc: Boss for a Day / The Goofy Newbie - Mr. Krabs has an accident and leaves SpongeBob in charge of the Krusty Krab. What could go wrong? // Patrick takes a job at the Goofy Goober when he finds out the employees get free ice cream.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep260
programme.desc: Knock Knock, Who's There? / Pat Hearts Squid - SpongeBob watches Mr. Krabs's house while he's away, so he takes extreme measures to make sure no one breaks in. // Squidward is forced to room with Patrick, but his domineering demeanor rubs off on Patrick more than he'd like.

programme.title: Vietnam's 50th Anniversary
programme.desc: 2023 marks 50 years since Australia officially withdrew its military presence from the Vietnam War. On Vietnam Veterans' Day, the anniversary of the Battle of Long Tan in 1966, we remember the sacrifices of those who served.

programme.title: Australia's Vietnam 50th Anniversary
programme.desc: To mark the 50th anniversary of the end of Australia's involvement in the Vietnam War, a special commemorative service at the Australian Vietnam Forces National Memorial on Anzac Parade in Canberra.

programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: My Street Piano
programme.desc: One of Japan's leading resort areas, Okinawa. In the middle of Koza Music Town, a piano is placed for a limited period. Watch players from all walks of life come to share their melodies.

programme.title: Ramen Japan
programme.desc: A whirlwind tour of Hokkaido's best ramen! Why not whet your appetite with the origin story of Sapporo miso ramen?

programme.title: Magical Japanese "Fire"
programme.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history, and culture. This episode looks at words related to fire. Explore the unique culture behind them.

programme.title: Core Kyoto Mini
programme.desc: The festival on October 22 pays homage to Kyoto's 1200-year history with people parading in period costumes. Discover the citizens' resilience as they created a new Kyoto.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Time-Lapse Journey
programme.desc: The world comes alive in a different way after sunset, with bright city lights or the glow of a 24-hour industrial complex. See how the scenery changes through the night with time-lapse photography.

programme.title: Matsuri: The Heartbeat Of Japan
programme.desc: Kagura is a form of votive music and dance that started over a thousand years ago. Akitakata in Hiroshima Prefecture has a hall dedicated to year-round kagura performances, and 22 kagura troupes.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Renowned pianist Tigran Hamasyan talks about the beauty of traditional folk music and what it can do to connect people around the world.

programme.title: Ukiyoe Edo-Life: Will Sparks Fly?
programme.desc: A dapper young man sits in a teahouse with his older companion when a young woman catches his eye. From the way they're looking at each other, it's clear that there's something going on between them.

programme.title: I'M Still Here
programme.desc: Keiko Ogura, age 85, has spent her life talking to the world about her experiences as an A-bomb victim in Hiroshima. When she talks with Americans in a small college town, what does she discover?

programme.title: Time-Lapse Journey
programme.desc: Kamikochi is a beautiful mountainous region in Nagano Prefecture that's 1,500m above sea level. With a mirror-like pond and rime ice, see the frozen beauty of Kamikochi through time-lapse photography.

programme.title: Frontrunners
programme.desc: Travel to the mountains of Kyoto and follow the heir to a unique inn with 130 years of history, pioneering wild food cuisine and traditional hospitality attuned with nature and the seasons.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Artists Against War
programme.desc: Morimura Yasumasa is a renowned artist known for his maverick self-portraits. When asked whether he could become Putin, he starts recounting his thoughts on the role of art in relation to war.

programme.title: Short Program
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a variety of short programs focusing on Japan and Asia.

programme.title: Trails To Oishii Tokyo
programme.desc: Figs are a rising star in Japan. An orchard is hard at work cultivating varieties for all kinds of recipes, from sweet to savory. Discover how the fruit is enhancing Japanese cuisine.

programme.title: Biz Stream Special Edition

programme.title: A Culture Built With Wood Kishu
programme.desc: Kishu, in the southern part of the Kii Peninsula, is famous among chefs worldwide for its charcoal production. Join us as we examine what fuels the eco-friendly charcoal culture of Kishu.

programme.desc: Tokyo: where both tradtion and the latest trends coexist. Join us on a journey to historic old towns and encounter many fun suprises along the way.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Sandhagen vs Font
programme.desc: Prelims - A bantamweight bout between former interim UFC Bantamweight Championship challenger Cory Sandhagen and Umar Nurmagomedov was expected to headline the event. However, Nurmagomedov withdrew from the event in mid-July due to a shoulder injury. He was replaced by Rob Font in a catchweight bout of 140 pounds. The Ultimate Fighter: Team Joanna vs. Team Cludia women's strawweight winner Tatiana Suarez and Virna Jandiroba were scheduled to meet in a women's strawweight bout. However on June 20, it was announced that Jandiroba pulled out due to a knee injury and was replaced by former UFC Women's Strawweight Champion Jssica Andrade.

programme.title: 2023Gran Premio MotoGP Guru by Gryfyn de Espaa Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - The Spanish Grand Prix at the Circuito de Jerez is a colourful event which draws massive crowds from all over to watch the worlds best riders do battle in the sunshine of Andalusia. The Jerez circuit in southern Spain was built in 1986, hosted its first Grand Prix a year later and has remained on the MotoGP calendar ever since. As a nation, Spain has produced some great riders over the years such as Angel Nieto, Ricardo Tormo, Sito Pons, Alex Criville and Jorge Martinez Aspar. The likes of Jorge Lorenzo, Marc Marquez, Dani Pedrosa and Maverick Viales now continue the Spanish success story in the premier class

programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.desc: Prelims - UFC returns to UFC APEX in Las Vegas this weekend with a clash of top ranked welterweight contenders as No. 10 Vicente Luque welcomes former UFC lightweight champion Rafael Dos Anjos into a rankings challenge. In the co-main event at featherweight, fan favorite Hall of Famer Cub Swanson squares off against surging KO artist Hakeem Dawodu. programme.title: 2023 Monster Energy British Grand Prix Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - With more than 60 years of history Silverstone has become one of the most prestigious venues dedicated to motorsport. Completely revamped in recent years, a multimillion pound investment saw the completion in 2010 of a first phase of works to greatly improve the venue, making it one of the fastest tracks on the MotoGP calendar and earning high praise from the World Championship riders who enjoyed the new layout. The Silverstone Wing, a state-of-the-art, multi-million pound complex, became a new landmark at the circuit from 2011, thus adding to already breathtaking facilities at Silverstone
